complexProductCategory.4: Structured bonds not intended for QI
complexProductCategory.5: Closed mutual funds not intended for QI
complexProductCategory.7: Bonds of foreign issuers, the execution of which is ensured at the expense of a unrated legal entity of the Russian Federation
complexProductCategory.9: Stocks not included in quotation lists
complexProductCategory.11: ETF units/stocks not included in the quotation lists and admitted to organized trading in the presence of an agreement between the trade organizer and the 'responsible' person
complexProductCategory.12: ETF units/stocks not included in quotation lists and admitted to organized trading in the absence of an agreement between the trading organizer and the 'responsible' person
complexProductCategory.13: Bonds of Russian or foreign issuers convertible into other securities
complexProductCategory.14: Bonds of Russian issuers with 'jurisdiction' of issue outside the permitted scope
complexProductCategory.15: Bonds of foreign issuers with the issuer's 'jurisdiction' outside the permitted scope
complexProductCategory.17: All securities not subject to tests from the Basic Standard. Securities not listed on the St. Petersburg Exchange arising as a result of corporate events
